name: Infotura Technologies Pvt Ltd
description:
We are an agency that provides strategic, creative and results-focused online & mobile solutions for the corporate and consumer markets. Our group has a strong focus on providing corporate identity & branding, website design & development, online applications, mobile applications, WPF & Silverlight. With good aesthetic tastes and great technology, we design compelling visuals, user-friendly and custom applications for organizations of all shapes and sizes.
This range of services available at Infotura Technologies combined with a collaborative approach in achieving desired outcomes for all parties concerned has established open and productive working relationships with our clients. Infotura Technologies is all about making everything we do more meaningful, useful engaging and capturing hearts and minds.
